description: Best suited for devices running Android 5.0+
subtitle: Session based installer for bundled/split APKs
title: Session installer

description: Best suited for devices running below Android KitKat (4.4). Assigns the Play Store (com.android.vending) as installation source to installing apps.
subtitle: Intent based installer, available on all devices
title: Native installer

description: Requires root-access permission, supports all Android versions.
subtitle: Installer for background installations
title: Root installer

description: Requires Aurora Services (com.aurora.services) to be installed as system-privileged app (/system/priv-app).
subtitle: Installer for background installations
title: Aurora Service

description: You must have App Manager (io.github.muntashirakon.AppManager). Need ADB/root mode to install when MIUI optimization is ON.
subtitle: Install use App Manager
title: AM Installer
